summary.text: This class manages a basic circle geometry.
The webgl context this Circle belongs to
The radius of the circle
The number of segments of the circle

Draw the circle.
You need to link a program before calling this method.
This class manages a basic circle outline geometry.
The webgl context this CircleOutline belongs to
The radius of the circle outline
The number of segments of the circle outline
The thickness of the outline

Draw the circle outline.
You need to link a program before calling this method.
